title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8159.00 - Designation of access highways pending construction of a new bridge on IR 90 (Thomas E. Dewey Thruway) at Fort Hunter, Town of Florida, Montgomery County
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8159.00 - Designation of access highways pending construction of a new bridge on IR 90 (Thomas E. Dewey Thruway) at Fort Hunter, Town of Florida, Montgomery County

State Regulations

Pending the construction of a new bridge on IR 90 (Thomas
E. Dewey Thruway) at Fort Hunter, in the Town of Florida, Montgomery County, replacing the bridge that collapsed on April 5, 1987, the following State
highways are hereby designated as access highways, to be used in conjunction
with other access highways for the purpose of providing access for special
dimension vehicles around the impasse. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8159.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
